Package cz.zcu.kiv.crce.concurrency.model

Class Task<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.zcu.kiv.crce.concurrency.model.Task<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Job result type Date: 11.11.13
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Callable<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ChainableTask
    public abstract class Task<T>
extends Object
implements Callable<T>
    Task base class to be used by client modules. Override this class to provide the actual code of the job to be done in background.
    Author:
    Jakub Danek

    • Constructor Detail

      • Task

        protected Task​(String id,
               String description,
               String module)
        Initialize Task description for easy tracking. Keep in mind that id,module pair should be always unique!
        Parameters:
        id - job ID
        description - job description
        module - calling module - for easy tracking of where the Task has come from

      • run

        protected abstract T run()
                  throws Exception
        Override this to provide job's logic. Optionaly the job can return a result.

        Throws:
